message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you my product for $20,000. I believe it will be a valuable asset to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $18,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my original asking price. Would you consider $19,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $18,500 for the product.
